specialRules.description: Whenever this unit fights in melee pick one fighting style: • Cut: +1A in melee.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 12”, which get Stealth next time they are shot at.

specialRules.label: Distortion Drummer
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 12”, which get Stealth next time they are shot at.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Ambush rule, and once they are deployed they get the Fast rule next time they move.
specialRules.name: Divine Navigator
specialRules.label: Divine Navigator
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Ambush rule, and once they are deployed they get the Fast rule next time they move.

specialRules.hint: Whenever the hero and his unit cause a wound place a healing marker next to any friendly unit within 12”. When a unit with healing markers takes a wound you may remove one healing marker and roll one die, on a 4+ the wound is ignored.
specialRules.name: Lantern of Souls
specialRules.label: Lantern of Souls
specialRules.description: Whenever the hero and his unit cause a wound place a healing marker next to any friendly unit within 12”. When a unit with healing markers takes a wound you may remove one healing marker and roll one die, on a 4+ the wound is ignored.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit shoots pick one shooting style: • Aim: +2 to hit when shooting.
specialRules.name: Shots of Grace
specialRules.label: Shots of Grace
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit shoots pick one shooting style: • Aim: +2 to hit when shooting.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to hit rolls in melee and +1 to morale test rolls.

specialRules.label: Spirit Ledger
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to hit rolls in melee and +1 to morale test rolls.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick 2 friendly units within 12”, which get +1 attack in melee next time they fight.

spells.name: Power Tide
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets AP(+1) in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Sea Storm
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Darkest Abyss
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Erode Soul
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: High Tide
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6” may be moved by up to 6” in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Crushing Pressure
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 6 hits with AP(1) each.
